chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit pl0 pl1) n

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
pl_produit = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl_produit_1 pl0 (pl_essence pl0 pl1) pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive pl_tl_length : prec_list -> nat -> Prop := pl_tl_O : pl_tl_length prec_empty 0 | pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n) | pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n) For pl_tl_length: Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope] For pl_tl_S: Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _] For pl_tl_propag: Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope _ _]
pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall n m : nat, pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) n : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_tl_length_prod_def_0 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (l : prec_list) (a : ad) (n m : nat), pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length l (S n) \/ l = prec_empty -> (pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) (S n)) /\ (pl1 = prec_empty -> (pl_tl_length l (S n) -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) (S n)) /\ (l = prec_empty -> pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l = prec_empty)) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_compatible = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => exists n : nat, pl_tl_length pl0 n /\ pl_tl_length pl1 n : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_occur_ind : forall P : prec_list -> ad -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> P pl0 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> P pl1 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> P p a
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
mpl_compat_0 : forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl0) (M1 prec_list c pl1) -> pl_compat pl0 pl1
pl_tl_length_pl_compat : forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p0 n -> pl_tl_length p1 n -> pl_compat p0 p1
pl_tl_length_ind : forall P : prec_list -> nat -> Prop, P prec_empty 0 -> (forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> P pl n -> P (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> P la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> P ls (S n) -> P (prec_cons a la ls) (S n)) -> forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> P p n
prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a
pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n)
pl_compat_sym : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compat pl0 pl1 -> pl_compat pl1 pl0
pl_compatible_sym : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compatible pl0 pl1 -> pl_compatible pl1 pl0
pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
pl_compat_check_correct : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> pl_compat_check p = Some n
pl_compat_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_compat_check p = Some n -> pl_tl_length p n
Inductive pl_tl_length : prec_list -> nat -> Prop := pl_tl_O : pl_tl_length prec_empty 0 | pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n) | pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n) For pl_tl_length: Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope] For pl_tl_S: Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _] For pl_tl_propag: Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope _ _]
pl_path_incl_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n
liste_rec_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (d : preDTA) (n : nat), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> n = lst_length tl
pl_tl_length_rec_6 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl
forall_incl_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), (forall p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl -> pl_path_length p = n) -> pl_tl_length pl n
pl_compat = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl0 = prec_empty /\ pl1 = prec_empty \/ pl0 <> prec_empty /\ pl1 <> prec_empty : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_essence = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl_card pl0 + pl_card pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> nat

```coq
intros pl0 pl1 n H1 H2.
unfold pl_produit.
rewrite <- pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 with (pl0:=pl0) (pl1:=pl1).
intros m H3.
apply pl_tl_length_ind.
- intros.
  apply pl_tl_O.
- intros a pl n0 IHn0 H4.
  simpl.
  rewrite <- pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 with (pl0:=pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) (pl1:=prec_empty).
  intros m0 H5.
  apply pl_tl_S.
  apply IHn0.
  apply H3.
  auto.
- intros a la ls n0 IHn0 H4 IHn1 H5.
  simpl.
  rewrite <- pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 with (pl0:=pl_produit_1 pl0 m la) (pl1:=ls).
  intros m0 H6.
  apply pl_tl_propag.
  apply IHn0.
  apply H3.
  auto.
  apply IHn1.
  apply H3.
  auto.
Qed.

original: intros pl0 pl1 n H1 H2. unfold pl_produit. rewrite <- pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 with (pl0:=pl0) (pl1:=pl1). intros m H3. apply pl_tl_length_ind. - intros. apply pl_tl_O. - intros a pl n0 IHn0 H4. simpl. rewrite <- pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 with (pl0:=pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) (pl1:=prec_empty). intros m0 H5. apply pl_tl_S. apply IHn0. apply H3. auto. - intros a la ls n0 IHn0 H4 IHn1 H5. simpl. rewrite <- pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 with (pl0:=pl_produit_1 pl0 m la) (pl1:=ls). intros m0 H6. apply pl_tl_propag. apply IHn0. apply H3. auto. apply IHn1. apply H3. auto.
